name: Glide (CheckmateGames)
description:
A simple paper plane glide game. play now and feel the air.

Are you looking for a simple yet fun game? Try glide consisting five fun levels and more to come in future .

KEY FEATURES:

- GLIDE THROUGH VARIOUS LOOPS TO GET TO THE END.

- BUY DIFFERENT COLOR SKINS FOR THE PLANE AND ALSO DIFFRENT TRAILS.

(MORE UPDATES TO COME...)
